problem: Suppose that $$\begin{array}{@{}c@{\;}c@{}c@{}c} && &P_b \\ & \times & & P_b \\ \cline{2-4} & & Q & P_b, \\ \end{array} $$where $P$, $Q$, and $b$ represent three distinct digits 1-9. If $Q=\frac{P}{472}$, and $P$ is two thousand, three hundred and fifty-four less than $b$, what is the value of the digit $P$?
